FBO.h

00001 #ifndef __FBO_H__
00002 #define __FBO_H__
00003 
00004 #include "exogl.h"
00005 
00006 #define MAX_MRTS 3
00007 
00008 class FBO
00009 {
00010 public:
00011         FBO(int _width = 640, int _height = 480);
00012         ~FBO();
00013         void setWidth(int _w){width = _w;reshape();};
00014         void setHeight(int _h){height = _h;reshape();};
00015         void setRes(int _width, int _height){width = _width;height = _height;reshape();};
00016         bool attach();
00017         bool detach();
00018         bool bindTextures();
00019 protected:
00020         void reshape();
00021         int width, height;
00022         GLuint color, depth, IDs[MAX_MRTS];
00023         GLenum mrts[MAX_MRTS];
00024         bool loaded;
00025 };
00026 
00027 FBO::FBO(int _width, int _height)
00028 {
00029         width = _width; height = _height;
00030         for(int i = 0; i<MAX_MRTS;i++)
00031                 mrts[i] = GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT+i;
00032         
00033         glGenFramebuffersEXT(1, &color);
00034         glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, color);
00035         
00036         glGenRenderbuffersEXT(1, &depth);
00037         glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, depth);
00038         glRenderbufferStorageEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, width, height);
00039         glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, depth);
00040         
00041         glGenTextures(MAX_MRTS, IDs);
00042         
00043         for(int i = 0; i<MAX_MRTS;i++)
00044         {
00045                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, IDs[i]);
00046                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA32F_ARB, width, height, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, NULL);
00047                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00048                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00049                 glFramebufferTexture2DEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT+i,GL_TEXTURE_2D, IDs[i], 0);
00050         }
00051         
00052         GLenum status = glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT);
00053         if(status != GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT)
00054         {
00055                 loaded = false;
00056                 return;
00057         }
00058         loaded = true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 FBO::~FBO()
00062 {
00063         if(loaded)
00064         {
00065                 glDeleteTextures(MAX_MRTS, IDs);
00066                 glDeleteRenderbuffersEXT(1, &depth);
00067                 glDeleteFramebuffersEXT(1, &color);
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool FBO::attach()
00072 {
00073         glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, color);
00074         glDrawBuffers(MAX_MRTS, mrts);
00075         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT|GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00076         
00077         return true;
00078 }
00079 
00080 bool FBO::detach()
00081 {
00082         glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, 0);
00083         glDrawBuffer(GL_BACK);
00084         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT|GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);       
00085         
00086         return true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 bool FBO::bindTextures()
00090 {
00091         for(int i=0;i<MAX_MRTS;i++)
00092         {
00093                 glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0+i);
00094                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, IDs[i]);
00095         }
00096         
00097         return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void FBO::reshape()
00101 {
00102         glBindFramebufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, color);
00103         
00104         glBindRenderbufferEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, depth);
00105         glRenderbufferStorageEXT(GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT24, width, height);
00106         glFramebufferRenderbufferEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT_EXT, GL_RENDERBUFFER_EXT, depth);
00107         
00108         for(int i = 0; i<MAX_MRTS;i++)
00109         {
00110                 glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, IDs[i]);
00111                 glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA32F_ARB, width, height, 0, GL_RGBA, GL_FLOAT, NULL);
00112                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00113                 glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
00114                 glFramebufferTexture2DEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0_EXT+i,GL_TEXTURE_2D, IDs[i], 0);
00115         }
00116         
00117         GLenum status = glCheckFramebufferStatusEXT(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_EXT);
00118         if(status != GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE_EXT)
00119         {
00120                 loaded = false;
00121                 return;
00122         }
00123         loaded = true;
00124 }
00125 #endif
